description: The Knight of Wands is seen on his horse that is reared up and ready for action. Judging from the knight’s clothes and armor, as well as his horse, he is prepared for what’s ahead. He is wearing a yellow patterned shirt on top of his metal armor. He is also wearing an armor helmet with red plume sticking out of it. He seems to be ready for battle, except he is holding a large wand instead of a sword. His horse is orange in color and has a mane that looks like flames. When you look at the Knight of Wands' face, you’ll see the determination of wanting to be successful in his endeavor. Fire is a dominate factor in the Knight of Wands' symbolism. The decorative tassels hanging from his arms and back, as well as the horse’s mane, are all in the color of flame. He is also wearing a yellow shirt printed with the fiery salamander symbol.

upright.overview:
The Knight of Wands' symbolism is straightforward. When it appears, it means a great time to get away and travel. The person should feel charged up and full of life. One is also ready to get things done. He is adventurous and can find fun things to do no matter where he is. There is never a dull moment when the Knight of Wands is around. When the Knight of Wands shows up in a reading it seems to suggest that the seeker wants to complete important tasks. One wants to impress others with one’s knowledge and skill. The card also shows up when the person is planning to move to another place of residence.
If you are starting a creative project, then you should do so with lots of energy and enthusiasm. However, you should balance it with realistic and well-rounded views. You should also have a plan that takes into account the consequences of your actions.

If you are starting a creative project, then you should do so with lots of energy and enthusiasm.

Getting the Knight of Wands in a reading can also mean that there is an event that you don’t expect to happen soon. If it is accompanied by the Eight of Wands, then you should expect a lot of changes in your life. More often than not, the Knight of Wands indicates a hasty change of job, residence, or anything in your life.
upright.love_meaning: Someone who is full of vitality and fearlessness may have just entered your love life with the Knight of Wands tarot love meaning. They are likely to be very impulsive, charming, and passionate. But their rash and volatile nature can make it difficult for them to settle down with one person. If this card doesn’t represent a person, it can instead point to a period in your love life that is exciting, but also erratic and adventurous. You may be more prone to taking risks at this time, which can pay off handsomely. Fear of rejection may not be a problem at this moment.
upright.career_meaning: The knight of wands is an enthusiastic card. This energy is a perfect complement for those who are starting new ventures. You are likely passionate about the new project that you are facing at work. You might be eager to take on new responsibilities. If, however, you are not starting anything new, you might be a bit frustrated at this lack of progress. The knight of wands can be a bit of a double-edged sword in that way. If you have a burst of enthusiasm but fear it might be going to waste, try to seek out new opportunities yourself. It might be that you have been waiting for things to fall into your lap when really you should have been seeking them out. Utilize your energy to advance, even if it takes extra effort on your part.
upright.finances_meaning: This card can sometimes signal that a large amount of money might be coming to you soon. It can be an ideal time to spend some money on a trip. Travel is a good way to use this influx in cash because, while you will not see a return on your investment, you will learn and broaden your horizons. Thus, travel, at this time, is not a waste of money. It is a smart, holistic choice. Do not give in to mindless spending. Use your money instead to expand your mind and take up new adventures. Investments in these types of projects will benefit you in the future whereas mindless spending will waste your good fortune.
upright.as_feelings:
The upright Knight of Wands reveals a passionate and adventurous spirit in how this person feels about you. They are captivated by your energy and enthusiasm, inspired by your zest for life. You ignite their imagination and awaken their desire for excitement. Their feelings pulse with vibrancy, reflecting a keen eagerness to explore new possibilities alongside you.
As for your own emotions, the Knight of Wands signals a surge of confidence and motivation within you. This connection invigorates you, urging you to embrace spontaneity and take bold steps forward. A sense of urgency drives you to act on these feelings, pushing aside any hesitations as you chase what truly excites your heart.
upright.as_actions: When you draw the upright Knight of Wands, it’s a clear signal to embrace your passions and take bold action. You should channel your energy into pursuing new adventures or creative projects that excite you. This card encourages you to break free from routine, explore uncharted territories, and trust your instincts. Consider signing up for a class in something you've always wanted to learn or planning a spontaneous trip to ignite your enthusiasm. Embrace challenges with confidence, as they will lead you toward personal growth and fulfillment. Remember, taking decisive steps today can set the stage for an exhilarating future filled with possibilities.
upright.love: fearless, courageous lover, difficult to commit, rash, erratic relationship
upright.career: passion and energy for work, brave decisions, new business favored
upright.finances: sudden influx of money, using finances for travel, expanding horizons

reversed.overview: You or another person in your life may be running from the idea of commitment right now. The reversed Knight of Wands tarot love meaning indicates impatience, instability and recklessness. This person may find themselves chasing after their heart’s desire one moment, but when they have it, quickly change his mind after. They may love the pursuit of romance, but not so much the simple, steady love that comes after. If you’re in a relationship, you may find that it feels unsteady right now, but this can also be due to the changes in your environment. Arguments are easy to spark now.

reversed.career_meaning: The reversed knight of wands can mean that you are directionless in your career. Unmoored, you might be bouncing from job to job without considering what you want and how you need to get there. While unpredictability is common in many people’s careers, it is becoming problematic in yours. Routine might be intimidating or boring, but if you have a direction you want to go in, you will likely have to embrace these characteristics in your future work. This does not mean you need to settle down now, it just suggests that you start moving vertically in a direction instead of horizontally.
reversed.finances_meaning: There is a tendency to get overconfident when we have money. This is a common urge, but if you find the knight of wands reversed here, you might be particularly susceptible to it right now. Even if you feel financially secure, now is not a good time to waste money or make large purchases. This principle is especially true in your investments. The reversed knight of wands can also signify a loss of some kind. In many instances, this will be unavoidable. Do not, however, facilitate this trend by participating in mindless spending or gambling. You are prone to lose more than you anticipated at the present moment. Thus, it is advisable to be particularly cautious right now.
reversed.as_feelings:
The arrival of the reversed Knight of Wands suggests a moment to explore the restlessness and uncertainty surrounding this person's feelings for you. They may be feeling overwhelmed or hesitant, struggling to channel their passion into meaningful action. Their emotions could be chaotic, leading them to question their own desires and intentions toward you. This indecision might stem from past experiences that have left them wary of pursuing something deeper.
You might sense a call to address your own confusion and frustration as indicated by the reversed Knight of Wands. You might feel a lack of direction or purpose in this connection, questioning whether it's worth your energy. This card encourages you to take a step back and reflect on what truly ignites your passion before moving forward.
reversed.as_actions: The appearance of the reversed Knight of Wands points to a crucial moment for you to pause and reassess your current path. This card indicates a need to slow down, as impulsive actions may lead to burnout or misdirection. Instead of rushing into new ventures, take time to reflect on your goals and motivations. Consider journaling about what truly excites you or exploring creative outlets that allow for deeper self-expression. Engage in conversations with trusted friends who can provide fresh perspectives, helping you clarify your desires. By grounding yourself in thoughtful action rather than reckless enthusiasm, you'll find a more fulfilling direction forward.

abyss: The Knight of Wands cradles in his hand an intriguing creature, a Fire Elemental. We can see the Page of Wands in the background, who stands ready with the wood and kindling she has collected. She has prepared the base for the fire, but without the creative spark the Knight of Wands has harnessed, no fire can exist. The Knight tends to the Fire Elemental carefully, shielding and protecting it from the wailing winds of the forest. His is the essential task of presenting the Fire Elemental to the Queen, that she might then ignite the bonfire. The Knight of Wands can sometimes appear when an important event will come to pass. It is a good card to receive in a reading, since it also brings with it a period of great creative potential. As an individual, he can be the personification of someone who is full of life and never afraid of a challenge. There is something disarming about him, and he knowingly uses this to his advantage. The Knight of Wands is a passionate individual who involves himself completely in any situation that he deems exciting. In the extreme, he can be a daredevil who recklessly throws caution to the wind, endangering himself and others. If you receive this card in your reading, ask yourself if you or anyone around you is exhibiting these traits.
